name: oropendola-ai-assistant
description: AI-powered assistant - v3.12.0: Complete Feature Parity (Auto-Condense, Sound Notifications, Full Roo-Code UX)

oropendola.api.url.description: Oropendola API base URL (HTTPS on port 443)

oropendola.api.key.description: Your Oropendola API key from oropendola.ai

oropendola.api.secret.description: Your Oropendola API secret from oropendola.ai

oropendola.agentMode.enabled.description: Enable Agent Mode for automatic AI model selection based on cost, performance, and availability

oropendola.agentMode.showModelBadge.description: Show which model was auto-selected by Agent Mode in chat messages

oropendola.user.token.description: Your Oropendola session token (automatically set after login)

oropendola.github.token.description: GitHub Personal Access Token for repository operations

oropendola.analysis.excludePatterns.description: Patterns to exclude from repository analysis

oropendola.chat.historySize.description: Maximum number of chat messages to keep in history

oropendola.session.cookies.description: Session cookies (automatically managed - do not modify manually)

oropendola.autocomplete.debounceDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds before triggering autocomplete

oropendola.edit.showDiffView.description: Show diff view when editing code with AI

oropendola.approval.mode.description: Approval mode for AI code changes
enumDescriptions: Manual approval required for all changes
Auto-accept safe changes (tests, docs, new files)

oropendola.approval.requireManualPattern.description: File patterns that always require manual approval (security-sensitive files)

oropendola.inlineCompletions.maxSuggesti.description: Maximum number of inline completion suggestions

oropendola.diagnostics.runOnSave.description: Run diagnostics automatically when files are saved

oropendola.indexing.enabled.description: Enable workspace indexing for better AI context

oropendola.indexing.onStartup.description: Index workspace automatically on extension startup

oropendola.indexing.excludePatterns.description: Glob patterns to exclude from workspace indexing

oropendola.chat.model.markdownDescription:
AI model selection:
- **auto**: Backend auto-selects best model
- **claude**: Claude Sonnet 4.5 (best for complex tasks)
- **deepseek**: DeepSeek (fast, cost-effective)
- **gemini**: Gemini 2.0 Flash (free, fast)
- **gpt**: GPT-4o (general purpose)
- **local**: Qwen 2.5 Coder (offline, privacy-first)

oropendola.chat.temperature.description: Temperature for chat responses (higher = more creative)

oropendola.codeActions.enabled.description: Enable AI-powered code actions and quick fixes

oropendola.codeActions.autoFixOnSave.description: Automatically apply AI fixes when saving files

oropendola.chat.mode.markdownDescription:
Interaction mode:
- **chat**: Simple Q&A, no tool execution
- **agent**: Full autonomy with tools (recommended)
- **code**: Optimized for code generation

oropendola.chat.enableTodoExtraction.description: Automatically extract and create todos from AI responses

oropendola.analytics.showCost.description: Show API cost information in responses

oropendola.allowedCommands.description: Commands that can run without user approval

oropendola.commandExecutionTimeout.description: Command timeout in seconds (0 = no timeout)

oropendola.commandRequireConfirmation.description: Require user confirmation for unknown commands

oropendola.maxReconnectAttempts.description: Maximum reconnection attempts before giving up

oropendola.reconnectInterval.description: Initial reconnect interval in milliseconds (uses exponential backoff)

oropendola.autoApprove.enabled.markdownDescription: Enable auto-approval system for tool operations. **Warning**: Auto-approving all operations can be risky. Use granular controls below for safety.

oropendola.autoApprove.readOnly.description: Auto-approve read-only operations (reading files within workspace)

oropendola.autoApprove.readOnlyOutsideWo.markdownDescription: Auto-approve reading files **outside** the workspace. **Use with caution!**

oropendola.autoApprove.write.description: Auto-approve write operations (creating/editing files within workspace)

oropendola.autoApprove.writeOutsideWorks.markdownDescription: Auto-approve writing files **outside** the workspace. **Use with caution!**

oropendola.autoApprove.writeProtected.markdownDescription: Auto-approve writing to **protected files** (`.env`, credentials, etc.). **Very risky!**

oropendola.autoApprove.execute.markdownDescription: Auto-approve command execution. **Use command allowlist/denylist for safety!**

oropendola.autoApprove.mcp.description: Auto-approve MCP tool and resource access

oropendola.autoApprove.allowedCommands.markdownDescription: **Whitelist** of allowed commands (patterns supported). Example: `git status`, `npm test`, `ls *`

oropendola.autoApprove.deniedCommands.markdownDescription: **Blacklist** of dangerous commands (patterns supported). These will **never** be auto-approved.

oropendola.autoApprove.maxRequests.markdownDescription: Maximum auto-approved requests per task (0 = unlimited). Prevents runaway operations.

oropendola.autoApprove.maxCost.markdownDescription: Maximum auto-approved cost per task in USD (0 = unlimited). Budget protection.

oropendola.autoApprove.requestDelay.description: Delay in seconds between auto-approved requests (prevents rapid-fire operations)

oropendola.autoApprove.followupTimeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds before auto-answering followup questions

oropendola.ai.model.description: AI model to use (only applies when Agent Mode is disabled)
enumDescriptions: GPT-3.5 Turbo - Fast and economical (16K context)

oropendola.ai.apiProvider.description: AI API provider (auto = determined by selected model)

oropendola.ai.streamingEnabled.description: Enable streaming responses for faster feedback

oropendola.ai.cacheEnabled.description: Enable prompt caching for faster responses and lower costs

oropendola.cost.budgetLimit.description: Monthly budget limit in USD (0 = unlimited)

oropendola.cost.alertThreshold.description: Alert when reaching this percentage of budget limit (0.8 = 80%)

oropendola.fileOperations.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size in bytes that can be read or written (default: 1MB)

oropendola.fileOperations.maxLineCount.description: Maximum number of lines that can be read from a file

oropendola.fileOperations.protectedPatte.description: File patterns that require manual approval (glob patterns)

oropendola.commandExecution.timeout.description: Maximum command execution time in seconds

oropendola.commandExecution.allowedComma.description: Whitelist of commands that can be executed without approval (empty = allow all)

oropendola.commandExecution.deniedComman.description: Blacklist of dangerous commands that should never be executed

oropendola.browserAutomation.enabled.description: Enable browser automation for testing and web scraping

oropendola.browserAutomation.headless.description: Run browser in headless mode (no visible UI)

oropendola.browserAutomation.maxSessions.description: Maximum number of concurrent browser sessions

oropendola.imageGeneration.apiKey.description: API key for image generation service

oropendola.imageGeneration.maxImages.description: Maximum number of images to generate per request

oropendola.mcpServers.autoConnect.description: Automatically connect to MCP servers on startup

oropendola.mcpServers.reconnectAttempts.description: Number of reconnection attempts if server crashes

oropendola.ui.theme.description: Color theme for the extension UI

oropendola.ui.fontSize.description: Font size in pixels for the chat interface

oropendola.ui.syntaxHighlighting.description: Enable syntax highlighting in code blocks

oropendola.ui.diffView.description: Diff view preferences for code changes

oropendola.prompts.customModes.description: User-created custom modes with prompts and variables

oropendola.codeIndex.enabled.description: Enable advanced code indexing with Qdrant

oropendola.codeIndex.indexOnStartup.description: Index workspace when VS Code starts

scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:performance && npm run test:a11y
scripts.build:production: npm run typecheck && NODE_ENV=production node esbuild.config.js
